manushyaya athuluwa samastha saththwa prajawa thula sobadahama wisin kalin kala shariraka nosansunbawak(lingika uththejanayak) athi karanu labanne prajananaya sadaha pamanak bawada, eya kisima pudgalayeku wisin aniwaryayen santharpanaya kara gatha yuththak nowana bawada, eya gataluwak wi aththe ekko santharpanaya kalayuthu wanne ese nathnam mardanaya kalayuthu wanne ema sharirika nosansun bawa sithin allagath wita pamanak bawa kenekuta awabodhawu awasthawedi ema awasthawe patan apurwa nidahasak saha sansun bawak ohu ho aya thula nirayasayenma athiwanneya.
